name: Trinity General School
startIntroPart1: Order, elegance, discipline, tradition and modesty – these are the virtues of a student from Trinity General School. In past, we used to be many schools, forced to fight side by side against the barbarian hordes of Gehenna Academy. But in their wisdom, founders of our great school have decided to put aside their differences and sign the Trinity Treaty which gave birth to a new global power in the academy city of Kivotos. Over the ages we maintained our traditions, and the heirs to those great schools still diverse our school. Pater, Filius and Sanctus factions of Tea Party, the Sisterhood, the Remedial Knights, Justice Realisation Committee and Trinity's Vigilante Crew, these worthy ladies now lead our glorious institution. Through the ages we had to adapt, our piety alone was not enough, so we had to become the traders, the richest people in the Academy City eventually. But our ancient enemy, the Gehenna barbarians, these pathetic, mindless beasts, insects that insult us with their very existence, still rattle in their district, ready to unleash their animalistic nature upon us once again...
startIntroPart2: The shadows loom above the roofs of our cathedrals, oh Presidents. Will we stand against the coming darkness? Will we be able to leave our names in stone of ages? Will we manage to rule Kivotos?..
attacked: Filthy barbarians think they can overrun us. To arms!
introduction: We, Tea Party, greet thee. Would you like to join us for this cup of tea?
neutralHello: Greetings, may the God bless thee.
neutralLetsHearIt: We see you would like to offer us something. Proceed, please.

neutralYes: After discussing this matter, we agreed to accept your offer.

afterPeace: The slaughter is over, we shall be leaving.
tradeRequest: We have prepared a deal to you, would you agree?

name: General Student Council
startIntroPart1: General Student Council has been established in order to organise the independent schools and prevent downfall of Kivotos. It served this purpose all these years and only the Great Schools could match its influence. We enforced our laws, demands and edicts upon all lesser schools this entire time. But recently, GSC president went missing which caused political collapse in Kivotos. Great Schools lost their shores, lesser schools stopped following our orders, terrorists, criminals and large corporations crawled out of their cracks.
startIntroPart2: Vice President Nanagani Rin, you have been elected to be the Acting President of General Student Council. You now hold in your hands almost ultimate authority and rights, but will you have strength and power to act upon your plans? Will you unite Kivotos and calm thos chaos, or fall to foes ineer or outer? Time will show us.

name: The Hellforge
startIntroPart1: Archive article 38: We have been banished from Millennium. 'Monsters!' they said. 'Madmen!', 'Murderers!', 'Maniacs!'... Don't they know knowledge has a price? These were necessary sacrifices in the name of science. We have been executing upon the ideals of development. But we were misunderstood and feared as the consequence. Fools always feared the genius. So we went far, farther to the Northern Wastes, beyond the permafrost belonging to Red Winter. There, we have found abandoned mining facilities, frozen into ground vehicles, horrors beyond our imagination and bands of forsaken barbarians. There started our struggle to survive. We became something far more terrifying than things that lurked in the shadows beneath the polar skies. We have raised metal walls of logic and cold hatred.
startIntroPart2: We have been nicknamed the Hellforge years later. We exchange the fruits of our ingenuity, unburdened by such pathetic concepts as morality and ethics, for slaves and food. Black smoke rises above our factory-fortress, a perfect amalgamation of occult and scientific. We did not forget those who betrayed us. We are returning.
